data.title: DETLEV BUCK — Talent Republic
data.meta_description:
Der Schauspieler Detlev Buck wird vertreten von der Agentur Talent Republic. 
The actor Detlev Buck is represented by Talent Republic Agency.
data.text:
WHY ME

Recently, Detlev Buck was shooting for the ARD series “Why Me?,” produced by Superfilm, and directed by David Schalko.

AMRUM

Earlier this year, Detlev Buck was shooting for the feature film”Amrum,” directed by Fatih Akin and produced by Corazon / bombero interational.

Zeit Verbrechen: Deine Brüder

Detlev Buck is part of the feature film “Zeit Verbrechen: Deine Brüder,” directed by Helene Hegemann and produced by X-Filme.

The film won the Deutscher FernsehKrimi-Preis 2024 and was screened at the Berlin International Film Festival 2024 in the Section: Panorama.

TRAUMNOVELLE

Detlev Buck plays a part in the feature film “Traumnovelle,” directed by Florian Frerichs and produced Warnuts Entertainment.
